content:
# The stone furnace has been successfully placed at the origin, but it is currently out of fuel and has no ingredients to smelt. 
# To get the furnace operational, we need to gather some iron ore or copper ore, which we can then smelt into plates.
#
# Let's first check our surroundings for any ore patches. We can locate the nearest iron or copper resource.

iron_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)  # Locate the nearest iron ore patch.
move_to(iron_position)  # Move to the iron ore patch.
harvest_resource(iron_position, quantity=10)  # Gather some iron ore.
print(f"Inventory after gathering iron: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory again.
